title: Create Parameters for Simulation with Uncertainty — simpar
text: nsim scalar numeric specifying number sets attempt theta vector point estimates fixed effect parameters covar variance-covariance matrix fixed effect parameters omega list variance-covariance matrices first level random effects sigma list variance-covariance matrices second level random effects odf vector omega degrees freedom, one per matrix sdf vector sigma degrees freedom, one per matrix digits number significant digits include output min lower limit parameter estimates max upper limit parameter estimates

title: Create Parameters for Simulation with Uncertainty — simpar
text: matrix, column names indicating parameters, row names indicating set number filtering min max.

title: Create Parameters for Simulation with Uncertainty — simpar
text: min max non-default (see ), may want set nsim marginally higher allow dropped sets. covar coerced matrix using .matrix. omega sigma lists, coerced using list. element coerced using .matrix. default, element odf sdf length (number elements) corresponding matrix. min max may given scalar values, case apply parameters (defaults). Alternatively, first n limits may specified vector, case remaining () default. simulated parameter fall limits, inclusive, entire parameter set (row) dropped result, warning.
